#Switch

package Practice;

public class Switch {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int weeknumber=1;
		
		switch(weeknumber){
		case 1: System.out.println("Sun");
		break;
		case 2: System.out.println("Mon");
		break;
		default :
		System.out.println("Tues");
		break;
		
		}
	}

}

#Output
Sun
